sentence.Network_en: Other causes of migraine are VDU screens and strip-lighting.
sentence.Network_cn: 偏头痛的其他诱因还有电脑的视频显示器和灯管照明。

sentence.Network_en: Sensitive Cream will not strip away the skin's protective layer.
sentence.Network_cn: 敏感肌肤专用面霜不会破坏皮肤表面的保护层。

sentence.Network_en: The approaches to the garrison have been heavily mined.
sentence.Network_cn: 通往驻防地的道路上地雷密布。
